page.title: 04Education in Priors Marston
page.content:
Priors Marston{First School}has{28 pupils aged 4 to 8, half from Priors Marston & half from the surrounding district & Priors Hardwick. They are taught in 2 classes, each teacher responsible for covering all aspects of the primary curriculum. As well as providing a solid grounding in Number & Language, the school is ideally situated to consider the many aspects of the local environment. The children are often to be seen walking round the village exploring the area.
At the age of{8}the children transfer to Feldon{Middle School}in Long Itchington, giving them a lengthy & time consuming journey by{free {school bus.
A{Pre-school Play Group}meets twice a week in the village hall.
